summary: Iteration 77: Sync Dashboard - All 9 backend tests passed. Frontend UI fully functional with all features verified.
passed_tests: GET /api/monday/adapters/wallet/sync-dashboard returns stats, recent_logs, recent_errors, user_items (200 OK)
sync-dashboard response structure validated (stats has linked_users, processed_subitems, webhook_success, webhook_errors, webhook_ignored)
sync-dashboard user_items structure validated (user_id, email, monday_item_id, board_id)
sync-dashboard recent_logs structure validated (status, timestamp, detail)
sync-dashboard endpoint requires auth (returns 401/403 without token)
POST /api/monday/adapters/wallet/resync-user/{user_id} re-syncs user to Monday.com (returns monday_item_id)
POST /api/monday/adapters/wallet/sync-all-users syncs all non-admin users (returns synced, failed, total counts)
frontend_tests_verified: Sync Dashboard tab visible in Monday.com Integration > Sync Dashboard
Stats cards render correctly (Linked Users=23, Processed Tx=4, Webhook OK=9, Errors=5, Ignored=1)
Linked Users section shows 20 users with email, Item ID, Board ID
Recent Webhook Events shows success/error logs with timestamps
Refresh button works - fetchData() is called
Sync All Users button works - triggers POST /api/monday/adapters/wallet/sync-all-users
Individual user re-sync button works - shows toast 'Re-synced: item {id}'
Recent Errors section displays when errors exist
critical_code_review_comments: WalletSyncDashboard.jsx: Well-structured component with proper data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
routes.py sync-dashboard endpoint: Correctly aggregates stats from mongodb collections
routes.py resync-user: Properly deletes old mapping before creating new Monday item
routes.py sync-all-users: Correctly filters non-admin users and tracks synced/failed counts
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing user data from production DB.

mocked_apis.note: Monday.com API is REAL - all GraphQL calls work, user re-sync creates real items on Monday.com board

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 77 tested the new Sync Dashboard feature. All endpoints work: GET /api/monday/adapters/wallet/sync-dashboard returns stats (linked_users, processed_subitems, webhook_success/errors/ignored), recent_logs, recent_errors, and user_items. POST /api/monday/adapters/wallet/resync-user/{user_id} re-syncs individual user. POST /api/monday/adapters/wallet/sync-all-users syncs all non-admin users. UI renders under Integrations > Monday.com > Sync Dashboard tab. Stats cards, linked users list, webhook events, refresh button, sync all button, and individual re-sync buttons all work correctly.
